summary: This is a New York City Police Department summons report for a parking violation issued to Jeffrey E. Epstein on April 25, 2013, for his vehicle parked at 29 Vandam St in Manhattan. The document was executed as part of a records search in December 2018.

persons.name: Jeffrey E Epstein

events.title: Parking Violation Issued to Epstein
events.description: A New York City Police Department summons was issued for a parking violation (No Parking) to a vehicle owned by Jeffrey Epstein at 29 Vandam St in Manhattan.

events.title: Document Execution / Report Generation
events.description: This police summons report was executed or generated, indicating it was likely retrieved or reproduced during an investigation.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein received a parking ticket in New York City on April 25, 2013, at 29 Vandam St.
Epstein's vehicle was a 2006 black Bentley with Florida license plates, registered to his Palm Beach, FL address.
The document was executed on December 10, 2018, suggesting it was retrieved or reviewed as part of a later investigation.
The violation was for 'No Parking (Non-COM)' and was issued by NYPD's T105 command/Precinct 001.
This document places Epstein in New York City on a specific date in 2013, which may be relevant for establishing his travel patterns or presence.
